body:
I know that the facecam is a bit laggy but I will make sure to fix that next vid... and also put sound higher.
will also be putting both parts (part 1-part 2) since it is a 30 min adventure map)

Part 1 : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=90sRBElzbAI&feature=youtu.be
Part 2 : coming soon
 
Make sure to watch with headphones on... you can hear the sound/music the best... and its a 1.8 snapshot or whatever xD (ASFjerome tagged it with that)

Hope you enjoy ^_^
 
 
NOTE: I DO NOT RECOMMEND WATCHING THIS IF YOU GET SCARED EASILY... LIKE ME WHICH I BECAME A RETARD AND DID THIS...

title: The Orphanage (facecam)(minecraft horror map)

replies.body: Minecraft horror maps are sh*t, they are not scary. .-.
